review: Great!  Super easy to connect.  Great options to view the Amazon library (pay and streaming); great synch with Amazon music.  Definitely a plus that I can use my iPhone as a remote and stream pics from my phone right to the TV through the Stick.  I bought this one when it was a promo to Prime members (for $20).  Glad I made the purchase.  If you have a smart TV it may not be needed, but its great for those TVs (without pre-built apps) that have USB and if you have access to wifi or a direct Ethernet hookup.
author: Mike

review: Be very very careful in attempting to learn how to use your stick, it is very easy to "purchase" items you are trying to watch .I am an  Amazon Prime member and attempted to watch the Vikings on my new "stick" and ended upgetting charged for a so called "purchase" of an episode of the Vikings that  I should get for freebut was charged nonetheless.  For some reason Amazon does mot make it very clear how to correct thismistake on their web page. So this is the only way I can bring to the attention of Amazon Prime members that be VERY VERY carefulhow you learn to use their product or you may end up "buying" a lot of so-called free material.
